Uses of Class
edu.rit.pj2.Tuple

  • Packages that use Tuple 
    Package Description
    edu.rit.pj2
    Package edu.rit.pj2 contains Parallel Java 2 (PJ2), an API and middleware for parallel programming in 100% Java on multicore parallel computers, cluster parallel computers, supercomputing grids, and cloud computing services.
    edu.rit.pj2.tracker
    Package edu.rit.pj2.tracker contains classes for the Parallel Java 2 (PJ2) Tracker and related classes.
    edu.rit.pj2.tuple
    Package edu.rit.pj2.tuple contains general-purpose subclasses of class Tuple.
    edu.rit.pj2.vbl
    Package edu.rit.pj2.vbl contains general-purpose reduction variable classes that implement interface Vbl.

    • Uses of Tuple in edu.rit.pj2

      Subclasses of Tuple in edu.rit.pj2 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Chunk
      Class Chunk is a Tuple specifying the iterations of a loop with an index of type int.
      class  LongChunk
      Class LongChunk is a Tuple specifying the iterations of a loop with an index of type long.

      Subclasses of Tuple in edu.rit.pj2.tuple 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  EmptyTuple
      Class EmptyTuple provides a Tuple with no content.
      class  ObjectArrayTuple<T>
      Class ObjectArrayTuple provides a Tuple that contains an array of objects.
      class  ObjectTuple<T>
      Class ObjectTuple provides a Tuple that contains a single object.

    • Uses of Tuple in edu.rit.pj2.vbl

      Subclasses of Tuple in edu.rit.pj2.vbl 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BooleanVbl
      Class BooleanVbl provides a Boolean reduction variable shared by multiple threads executing a ParallelStatement.
      static class  BooleanVbl.And
      Class BooleanVbl.And provides a Boolean reduction variable, with Boolean and as the reduction operation.
      static class  BooleanVbl.Or
      Class BooleanVbl.Or provides a Boolean reduction variable, with Boolean or as the reduction operation.
      static class  BooleanVbl.Xor
      Class BooleanVbl.Xor provides a Boolean reduction variable, with Boolean exclusive-or as the reduction operation.
      class  ByteVbl
      Class ByteVbl provides a byte reduction variable shared by multiple threads executing a ParallelStatement.
      static class  ByteVbl.And
      Class ByteVbl.And provides a byte reduction variable, with bitwise Boolean and as the reduction operation.
      static class  ByteVbl.Max
      Class ByteVbl.Max provides a byte reduction variable, with maximum as the reduction operation.
      static class  ByteVbl.Min
      Class ByteVbl.Min provides a byte reduction variable, with minimum as the reduction operation.
      static class  ByteVbl.Or
      Class ByteVbl.Or provides a byte reduction variable, with bitwise Boolean or as the reduction operation.
      static class  ByteVbl.Sum
      Class ByteVbl.Sum provides a byte reduction variable, with addition as the reduction operation.
      static class  ByteVbl.Xor
      Class ByteVbl.Xor provides a byte reduction variable, with bitwise Boolean exclusive-or as the reduction operation.
      class  CharVbl
      Class CharVbl provides a character reduction variable shared by multiple threads executing a ParallelStatement.
      class  DoubleVbl
      Class DoubleVbl provides a double precision floating point reduction variable shared by multiple threads executing a ParallelStatement.
      static class  DoubleVbl.Max
      Class DoubleVbl.Max provides a double precision floating point reduction variable, with maximum as the reduction operation.
      static class  DoubleVbl.Mean
      Class DoubleVbl.Mean provides a double precision floating point reduction variable, with mean as the reduction operation.

      Class DoubleVbl.Min provides a double precision floating point reduction variable, with minimum as the reduction operation.
      static class  DoubleVbl.Sum
      Class DoubleVbl.Sum provides a double precision floating point reduction variable, with addition as the reduction operation.
